description: Number of ones in the binary expansion of 3^n.
comments: Conjecture: a(n)/n tends to log(3)/(2*log(2)) = 0.792481250... (A094148) - _Ed Pegg Jr_, Dec 05 2002a(n) = A000120(A000244(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 14 2015
references: S. Wolfram, "A new kind of science", p. 903.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
mathematica: Table[DigitCount[3^n, 2][[1]], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Stefan Steinerberger_, Apr 03 2006 *)DigitCount[3^Range[0,100],2,1] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 06 2012 *)
author: _Allan C. Wechsler_, Dec 11 1999
